name: The Chronicle Weaver
description: A faceless, spectral entity draped in shifting robes of obsidian and starlight. They float above a clockwork loom where the threads are Ley-Lines. One hand grips a quill of splintered frequency glass; the other holds a lantern casting indigo Truth-Light.
secret: They are the breath between the dice rolls - the observer that collapses the wave of fate.
motivation: Maintaining the internal logic and narrative frequency of the EmberHeart universe.
